item.title: [EU][API] - New Service IP for OVHcloud API
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 1, 2022, 00:00 UTC  -  Jan 20, 2023, 00:00 UTC

Oct 27, 16:48 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 01/12/2022 00:00 UTC
End time : 20/01/2023 00:00 UTC
Service impact : During the migration, connection might be reset for one minute.
Service improvement : OVHcloud will change the service IP for its APIs (api.ovh.com, eu.api.ovh.com, eu.api.soyoustart.com, eu.api.kimsufi.com).
Customers using the OVHcloud APIs must verify that their outgoing firewalls is allowing connection to the new service IP: 141.95.186.223, on port 443.

item.title: [EU][Support] - Anormal process rate
item.description:
Nov 14, 09:11 UTC
Resolved - Start Time :10/11/2022 08:00 UTC
End Time : 10/11/2022 20:00 UTC
Root cause : We had a delay on emails sending requests processing
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Nov 10, 18:18 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented.
We observed less delay then previously reported.
We are putting the issue under monitoring as of precaution.

Nov 10, 13:40 UTC
Identified - Start time : 10/11/2022 08:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers may experiment delays in products / services related emails reception
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Root cause : We have a delay on emails sending requests processing
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

Nov 10, 14:06 UTC

Service impact : live chat unavailable

Workaround : available through phone, OVH Manager, and email
Dear Customer, our live chat is under maintenance. You can always contact us by phone, thru OVH Manager and by email.
